topic.title: Human Clinical Laboratory Test Result - conformance rules

section.p: The template includes information on laboratory data collected on a reporting form or received from a central provider or vendor.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:915)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:916)

SHALL contain [1..2] id (CONF:917)
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the laboratory result. [SDTM: LBSEQ, LBSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:918), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Laboratory Test Code C65047 STATIC (CONF:919)
A coded value that identifies the laboratory test result. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: LBTESTCD, LBTEST. LBLOINC] If the LOINC code is available it should be situated using the translation property within the CD type.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:920), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1546)
Used to indicate whether or not an exam has been performed. [SDTM: LBSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value (CONF:921)
The laboratory result, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. The information is captured as up to three observation values. [SDTM: LBORRES, LBORRESU, LBSTRESC, LBSTRESN, LBSTRESU] The data type for .value is listed as "ANY" since it may be coded - type = CD - it may be a physical quantity - type = PQR - or it may be text - type = ED. (Note, the PQR form is used to allow the use units of measure expressed as coded values.) The value presented by the investigator or party entering the data is captured as the base value. If this value is transformed to use standard units, or a standard code set, the transformed or normalized values are included as translations.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:922), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Method C85492 STATIC (CONF:923)
Indicates the method of the test or examination. [SDTM: LBMETHOD]

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:924)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:925)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:926)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the test result.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.42)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:927)
Information on the reason a scheduled activity was not carried out.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:928)
Information on the specimen that was tested to derive the observation value. It may include information on the collection of the specimen as well as on the specimen itself.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Specimen Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.78)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference Range (CONF:929)
Information on the reference range defined for a test. It is used to support interpretation of the test result.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Reference Range (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.74)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:930)
Used to indicate the fasting status - time since consuption of food - for the study subject.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Fasting Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.39)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:931)
A record of the toxicity measured by the test.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Toxicity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.98)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:932)
Used to identify the organization that performed the test.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Test Organization (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.88)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:933)
Creates an assoication between the timing of an activity and a defined reference time point.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Timing Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.97)

SHOULD contain [0..3] interpretationCode (CONF:934), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Subject Data Interpretation Consolidated Type CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:935)
Includes information used to better interpret the observation value (result). The information recorded may note whether the value is a base line value, whether it is derived, and/or its relationship to the reference range defined for the test. [SDTM: LBBLFL, LBDRVFL, LBNRIND]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:936)
The record of a category to be used in organizing information items.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.20)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:937)
The record of a sub-category to be used in organizing information items.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Sub- Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.91)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:938)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:939)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:940)
Allows recording of additional findings related to the event.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Finding About (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.40)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:915)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:916)

SHALL contain [1..2] id (CONF:917)
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the laboratory result. [SDTM: LBSEQ, LBSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:918), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Laboratory Test Code C65047 STATIC (CONF:919)
A coded value that identifies the laboratory test result. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: LBTESTCD, LBTEST. LBLOINC] If the LOINC code is available it should be situated using the translation property within the CD type.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:920), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1546)
Used to indicate whether or not an exam has been performed. [SDTM: LBSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value (CONF:921)
The laboratory result, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. The information is captured as up to three observation values. [SDTM: LBORRES, LBORRESU, LBSTRESC, LBSTRESN, LBSTRESU] The data type for .value is listed as "ANY" since it may be coded - type = CD - it may be a physical quantity - type = PQR - or it may be text - type = ED. (Note, the PQR form is used to allow the use units of measure expressed as coded values.) The value presented by the investigator or party entering the data is captured as the base value. If this value is transformed to use standard units, or a standard code set, the transformed or normalized values are included as translations.

SHOULD contain [0..3] interpretationCode (CONF:934), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Subject Data Interpretation Consolidated Type CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:935)
Includes information used to better interpret the observation value (result). The information recorded may note whether the value is a base line value, whether it is derived, and/or its relationship to the reference range defined for the test. [SDTM: LBBLFL, LBDRVFL, LBNRIND]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] methodCode (CONF:922), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Method C85492 STATIC (CONF:923)
Indicates the method of the test or examination. [SDTM: LBMETHOD]

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:924)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:925)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:926)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.42)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the test result.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:927)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)
Information on the reason a scheduled activity was not carried out.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:928)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Specimen Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.78)
Information on the specimen that was tested to derive the observation value. It may include information on the collection of the specimen as well as on the specimen itself.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference Range (CONF:929)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Reference Range (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.74)
Information on the reference range defined for a test. It is used to support interpretation of the test result.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:930)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Fasting Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.39)
Used to indicate the fasting status - time since consuption of food - for the study subject.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:931)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Toxicity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.98)
A record of the toxicity measured by the test.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:932)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Test Organization (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.88)
Used to identify the organization that performed the test.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:933)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Timing Reference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.97)
Creates an assoication between the timing of an activity and a defined reference time point.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:936)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.20)
The record of a category to be used in organizing information items.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:937)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Sub- Category (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.91)
The record of a sub-category to be used in organizing information items.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:938)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:939)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:940)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Finding About (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.40)
Allows recording of additional findings related to the event.
